message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations, but my initial price reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This is my best offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $950,000. This is my best and final offer.
